scripts.dev: npm run copy-sw && node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync('env.development', '.env')" && node node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js
scripts.dev:force: npm run clean:cache && npm run dev
scripts.dev:clean: npm run copy-sw && shx rm -f .env && shx cp env.development .env && vite
scripts.clean:cache: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');const viteCache=path.join('node_modules','.vite');if(fs.existsSync(viteCache)){fs.rmSync(viteCache,{recursive:true,force:true});console.log('✅ Vite cache cleared');}else{console.log('ℹ️ No Vite cache found');}"
scripts.build: node -e "try{require('fs').copyFileSync('env.production', '.env')}catch(e){console.log('env.production not found, using existing .env if available')}" && tsc -b && vite build
scripts.build:dev: shx cp env.development .env && tsc -b && vite build
scripts.dev:windows: npm run copy-sw && shx cp env.development .env && vite
